entry.title: Snorlax Mini Figure – Pokémon Collectible Sleeping Pose
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 149.00

Catch the ultimate lazy legend with this Snorlax mini figure in a cozy sleeping pose. Perfectly capturing the iconic Pokémon’s relaxed charm, this collectible is great for display, desk décor, or gifting to any Pokémon fan. Compact and cute, Snorlax is ready to nap right in your collection!

Features:
- Compact size for easy display (fits in your palm)
- High-quality sculpt with anime-accurate details
- Features Snorlax in his iconic sleeping pose on a cushion
- Perfect for desks, shelves, or Pokémon displays
- A must-have for Pokémon fans and collectors

Bring Snorlax home today and let this sleepy giant add cuteness to your collection!

entry.title: Mini Collectible - 15cm Black & Purple Anime Sword
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 149.00

Command the might of a legendary swordsman with this striking 15cm metal katana, directly inspired by Roronoa Zoro's iconic sword, Shusui, from One Piece! This beautifully crafted miniature blade features a sleek black sheath adorned with a distinctive purple circular pattern, perfectly capturing the unique design of the "Black Blade." The hilt is black with a bold gold guard, adding to its authentic samurai aesthetic.

While an excellent decorative collectible for your desk, shelf, or display cabinet, its robust metal construction and attached chain/keyring also allow it to be used as a unique and eye-catching keychain. A must-have for fans of One Piece and especially the master swordsman Zoro, this piece perfectly combines utility with intricate anime aesthetics.

entry.title: Naruto Anime Inspired Black Metal Kunai - 15cm Collectible Ninja Tool
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 99.00

Step into the world of Shinobi with this impressive 15cm metal kunai, inspired by the iconic ninja tools from the Naruto series! This collectible features a sleek black finish with "NARUTO" emblazoned in red on the blade. Its design, with four distinct finger holes on the handle, is reminiscent of the unique weapons wielded by characters like Asuma Sarutobi.

Perfect for display on your desk, shelf, or as part of your anime collection, this metal kunai is a must-have for any dedicated Naruto fan. Its robust construction makes it a striking decorative piece.

entry.title: One Piece Monkey D. Luffy Inspired Katana Metal Keychain - Black & Gold Anime Sword Keyring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 99.00

Carry a piece of the Grand Line with you with this sleek metal katana keychain, inspired by the world of One Piece and Monkey D. Luffy! This miniature sword features a classic black and gold design on the hilt and sheath, reminiscent of the iconic weaponry from the series, especially those carried by master swordsmen like Roronoa Zoro. It's a stylish way to show your allegiance to the Straw Hat Pirates.

Perfect for attaching to your keys, backpack, or even as a decorative charm, this durable metal keychain is a must-have for any fan. Its intricate details and classic color scheme make it a standout accessory.
